p: All experiments were performed in duplicate at least three times. Statistical analyses were performed using SPSS software (version 10.0, SPSS Inc., Chicago, IL, USA) analyzed with an analysis of variance test; a post hoc test of Tukey´s HSD was used for the analyses of mean comparison. Differences between means were considered significant at p-alues of ≤ 0.05. The multivariate analysis of Principal component analysis (PCA) was performed using SPSS (Version 19, IBM Corp, and Chicago, IL, USA).
